title: Standing by the Watchtower: Volume 1
description: Mightier Than the Sword UK is proud to present this collection of poetry in aid of Macmillan Cancer Support. Featuring work from poet and author C.S. Woolley, poet Alexandra Brennan and poet Tom Woolley along with contributions from Rebecca Granillo and Naomi Milnes. All royalties from the sale of this volume are directly donated to Macmillan Cancer Support
author: C.S. Woolley
